remarks: Lemma for ~ grpoidinv .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpfo.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpidinvlem3.2 $e |- ( ph <-> A. x e. X ( U G x ) = x ) $.
grpidinvlem3.3 $e |- ( ps <-> A. x e. X E. z e. X ( z G x ) = U ) $.
grpoidinvlem3 $p |- ( ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. X ) /\ ( ph /\ ps ) ) /\ A e. X ) -> E. y e. X ( ( y G A ) = U /\ ( A G y ) = U ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d U x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps y $.
